fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You run the server, and therefore can do any of the following:
- Redirect a player. If used at day, the target is forced to vote your second target whether or not they have a day ability.
- Ban a player.
- Learn a player's role.
- Add a new rule. (See President (606) for info)
- Add a new role. Your target becomes the new role you created.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can act at day and your abilities process immediately at day.
- Your abilities are infinite use, but if you use one, you must use all other abilities before you can use that one again, until all abilities have been used the same amount of time.
- You leave the server at the end of Day 5 (removed from the game) and win.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you, or step down from GIM.
